description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Forensic Accounting Expert Witness Testimony Excluded in Hotel Litigation
cases.description: The U.S. District Court in Wisconsin excluded a Forensic Accounting Expert Witness from testifying in a business dispute as that expert did not base his opinions on reliable methods.

cases.title: Psychology Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Employment Litigation
cases.description: A Psychology Expert Witness was allowed to testify as to plaintiff's damages following retaliation for whistle- blowing against former employer.

cases.title: Testimony of a Marine Engineering Expert Witness Limited in Accident Case on a Boat
cases.description: Plaintiff's Marine Engineering Expert Witness could only testify regarding boat safety standards, and could not offer legal conclusions.

cases.title: Licensing Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Cellular Communications Case
cases.description: A Licensing Expert Witness was allowed to testify regarding cellular communications standards and modem chips.
